item.title: Winda add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." -- Confucius

item.title: Winda add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Winda add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Winda add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough" -- Oprah Winfrey
